a research scientist at the Corning Museum of Glass, U.S.A. He received his Ph.D in Physical Chemistry from Rutgers University, USA. He served as the director of the Museum from 1972–1975

title: Born in Shanxi

a senior engineer of Shanghai Institute of Optics and Fine Mechanics. He graduated from Taiyuan Institute of Technology in 1965 and finished his postgraduate study at Shanghai University of Science and Technology in 1967. A concurrent editor of journal of Acta Optica Sinica and a member of the Science and Technology Translators
